feed.title: Kener Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: localisation strings for further clarity by @cosmic-jellyfish in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/223
  • fix: locale for no incidents as reported in #225 by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.4...3.0.5

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update pt-BR.json by @matribeiro15 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/227
  • feat: support of promises in eval by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/228

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.5...3.0.6

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add Turkish locale support and update locale files by @YunusEmreAlps in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/229
  • feat(triggers): support custom webhook body as requested in #230 by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/231

New Contributors

  • @YunusEmreAlps made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.6...3.0.7
